title: WTT: My T205 Sovereign Fletcher for your T206 Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Sovereign Fletcher for your T206 Sovereign
posts.post_content:
I recently completed my Sovereign T205 run, and have a few extras floating around, so I'm looking for traders to make progress on my T206 Sovereign run.  Condition isn't a big issue for me, as I'll upgrade along the way.  That's how I ended up with Mr. Fletcher, below.  If you look closely, you can see that it has a dinged corner, and a touch of paper loss on the back.  If you have a similar T206 to trade, let me know!

Take Care,
Geno

[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/47942426157_c3da5f8470_z.jpg[/img]

[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/47942461261_545a21ac7a_z.jpg[/img]
Mr. Fletcher has moved to the BST auction section, where he can currently be had for less than the price of a Starbucks Grande Pike Roast.
